OUTLINE : This uncontrolled , nonrandomized study . Patients receive neoadjuvant chemotherapy comprise epirubicin hydrochloride IV docetaxel IV day 1 . Treatment repeat every 3 week 6 course absence disease progression unacceptable toxicity . Patients undergo dynamic-contrast MRI treatment , 3 week first course chemotherapy , 3 week completion chemotherapy . They also undergo bilateral mammogram sonography clinical examination .
